SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[FormsValori] ( [FormsValori_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [FormsFields_Ky] int NULL , [FormsValori_Valore] varchar(200) NULL , [Anagrafiche_Ky] int NULL , [Forms_Ky] int NULL , [FormsFields_Codice] varchar(200) NULL , [FormsValori_UserInsert] int NULL , [FormsValori_UserUpdate] int NULL , [FormsValori_UserDelete] int NULL , [FormsValori_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [FormsValori_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [FormsValori_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[FormsValori] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_FormsValori PRIMARY KEY ([FormsValori_Ky])
